bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum frame, ORE TT/DT, forged HT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, ISCG mount, adjust geometry, replaceable derailleur hanger, derailleur guard, 170mm travel

components.description: Fox DHX 5.0 coil 9.0x2.75", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, and bottom out control, S:300, M:350, L:400
Alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
